title: Why did kalista get so popular?
body: Couple days ago no one played her. Now she's in every game.

replies.body: Season 5 started. The freelo gates were opened.
dont know why people only just figured runnans is good on her, used it for her the moment she was release, fools.
Why is everyone rushing that it never seems to work. Attacking 3 people for no damage whatsoever is not gud.

She has heaps of mobility as she levels up so she can catch up to enemies. Her spears stack infinite and does tons of damage when proc-ed with alot of stacks. You can see many players use Runaans Hurricane as the 2 darts from Runaans applies the spears to enemies aswell. 'OP'
